phrases: The big city where I grew up.
The shape of each sunny days
An old song was playing over and over again.
Some people will always carry in their heart.
Tu Xiao Yi, be more realistic.
Who is still look at such shallow mangas?
In mangas, you have to give the reader more pleasure, do you understand?
Since I am the company's president,
you should be like a loyal Golden Retriever
If you do not want to draw me a wolf cub, then you should draw me a puppy.
Will you continue drawing for me?
If you keep drawing your original manga,
I will no longer invest in that.
it is good to act as one.
But you can lose sight of yourself.
I remember when I was 17 years old.
But also a simple and realistic one.
The return of Makao is in 11 days.
I will share a new song by Pu Shu, New Boy.
Gramps, I am going to school.
Here is one bowl of tofu buns.
Owner, are my Bao Zi done?
The old man will kill you.
I will carry the Bao Zi.
Tu Xiao Yi, wait for me!
Hurry up, the bell is about to ring.
Your average for the last semester are the worst.
Now we must raise your average with blackboard reports.
It does not matter if it is by studying or on the blackboard.
You must be a good influence for others
You get here late just after the beginning of class.
Why not come when classes ends while at it?
And you dare to sneak into my classroom.
Did you think you could do it?
You two, when you are not looking at mangas or playing video games,
You are always getting here at bell time.
Not even dogs can catch up after class.
In what course do you think you are?
Do you think the school is your house?
How did your father teach you?
Now try not to be late anymore.
This year you are trying to get into a university.
If you have a problem, you can come and tell me.
Do you feel good being in the last row?
Do you want me to put you up closer ahead?
I am afraid you would not get used to that.
You two, why are you still standing there?
So he is Qi Jin Xuan.
He is the son of the director of education.
My mother wants me to focus on the exams.
She does not want me to make more blackboard reports.
But so is the honor of the course.
Will you be able to go to the university if you draw all the time?
Yao Zhe Tian still has to do her dance training.
This semester you will help her with the blackboard reports.
At least you will be useful.
Making blackboard reports with Yao Zhe Tian...
A blessing after the disaster, eh?
If you strive now, in the future you will shine.
And that all the other things are not important.
Anyone causing a disturbance will come to my office after school.
we only have 2 things to remember.
things and people that he says are not important
are more real and clear than exams
and they exists in my life.
I want to talk about the blackboard report.
I was afraid you would say that we are bothering you!
And we even let you have some time with the ball.
I will go drop my dance shoes.
Why are you giving me the ball?
The last point, we cannot let that score.
The ball has no eyes, it is not my problem.
You are the one who does not have eyes!
He said he is okay, let us continue.
Let me try the last shot.
No matter what, do not let that score!
If he scores, I will eat the ball.
I did not know you knew how to play basketball.
I just pretended to know, I only know how to draw.
Did your parents make you draw?
I was drawing just by seeing the covers.
I like it ever since I was a kid.
So your family wants you to become a painter?
I do not want to be a painter, I like to draw manga.
Are you planning to enter an art university?
I probably cannot, I have such low grades.
Art colleges needs at least 200 points.
So it is beyond my reach.
You have something that you really like.
It is good that you have something that you really...
I knew that I really liked someone.
My cloudy sky looked like it opened in a corner
and that a dazzling light appeared.
Now more than ever, I want to will give you private lessons.
Now, remember when you go back to tell your father
that I will not charge anything for giving you private class.
It definitely does not violate the rules.
The ministry of education prohibits any paid private individual class.
being the teacher who is in the last line.
I will tell my father when I get back home
that you are a teacher who thinks about the students.
It would be a shame if you are not a director of the education ministry.
Also, bring this to your father.
Why are you two still here?
Teacher, we are doing the blackboard report.
They will see it tomorrow, what should we do?
First let us think about cleaning it.
Now let us finish the rest.
-Then Bie Bing Yang -Jian Li Bao is fine.
Cannot you have a little more coordination?
Ah, are you sure that old Chen will not get mad?
Does not he get angry every day?
He does not care about anything other than the final exam.
I can give you particular help.
No... do not waste your time.
Only thinking about the final exam.
Well, I will take you to a special place.
The iron tower of the mountain.
It is my first time seeing LAN Xi from so high.
This is the first time I am so close to heaven.
When my mother comes back and does not find me, she is going to question me.
I am not sure if Yao Zhe Tian should returns alone.
How about we accompany her home?
I do not know who is not sure.
Then I will wait for you.
I was just telling Qi Jin Xuan
that we will accompany you home.
What university are you going to go to?
Maybe I will go to a trade school.
Or maybe one for math or doctor.
Since I do not know much.
Any place is strange to me.
So many universities that you can choose.
Is there none that you like?
I do not know these universities.
How will I know if I like them or not?
then you can go to the best universities.
In his class a couple of students did something bad
so he went to fix the problem.
Look at what children do now...
We do not known what they are thinking.
They just accompanied me home on the way.
Miss, you do not need to thank us,
I was forgetting to thank you.
Are you also in her dance class?
Did not you say it was just in your way?
It would be nice if we could look up some information about universities for Yao Zhe Tian.
Tian Tian, the magazine that you like to read, I already ordered it for the whole year.
Get over yourself and do not give up!!
It shows everything that will be in the exam!
This is more interesting than love stories and other things.
Hey, does it look like Slam Dunk?
Why did you draw the big gorilla?
That Tu Xiao Yi never study.
He only knows how to draw these things.
The origin of everything, it is quite deep.
Master Chen, it seems that finally the board could get the first place.
They cannot look only at the notes,
I always wish they could also use their intellect and art.
Who could mark Sakuragi and Rukawa?
The blackboard reports should not be done with so little content.
There must also be good content on the board.
we must get the first place
to bring honor to our class.
I definitely did not pick the wrong person.
You did not spend that many days with Tian Tian
and you already want to go to the university?
Shut up, what are you saying?!
that there are many people who want to know about universities?
If we put those infos on the board, surely someone will see them.
We can meet old Chen's needs.
You are really putting a lot of efforts.
Hey, you even put some English.
If you have skills, better worry for yourself.
How about we make a bet?
If you win, I will help you.
do not you know how incredible he is with Tetris?
Hey, do you want to try or not?
We did not see each other for more than 10 years.
You finally thought about calling me.
Now I am in LAN Xi.
I will call you back in a little while.
Take it, this one is for you.
I think that this time we can present these universities.
Yes, I think it is pretty good.
Do not take a picture, give it to me!
There will be a mock exam.
Anyone is allowed to make mistakes.
If you do, it is not going to influence your scores.
It would just be bad luck.
But for my parents, there is no such thing as luck for the exam.
They only want the best for you.
They wish the best for us?
They only care about their standing.
When have they ever thought about what we are thinking?
Let me see, it is very deep.
It will become infected if we do not clean it.
You do not have to bother.
I better put a bandage on it.
Again, getting angry out of nowhere.
I found it on the blackboard.
What university can I go to if I get 300 points?
Do not you feel that you have accomplished something?
Are you talking about the blackboard or the score?
Are you comparing points with her?
You should leave a comment book.
That way she should not have to leave notes.
It is already going to be the winter holidays.
Let us take her out to play.
I do not know if she can come.
I gave you the opportunity, everything depends on you.
We will get there just after we get up this steep road.
Try a little more and then it is all down hill.
Why is not Yao Zhe Tian already out?
We are not at the wrong place, right?
Even though he makes mistake about your house, he would not be wrong about Yao Zhe Tian's house.
How are you usually calling Hua Sheng?
He always calls me by throwing stones.
I will look for a stone for you.
If you go with the girls,
Take this, it is cold outside.
After the 8th, it will be the Chinese new year.
You really have to follow the calendar.
You said that you would only say two words.
how about helping her with her lessons?
When you come back, we will go over everything again.
I will give you my gloves.
How about I give you my gloves?
I can also put my hands in my pockets.
You really do not want my gloves?
Tu Xiao Yi, Qi Jin Xuan handles it better than you.
Then you better get off and run.
I fear that Tu Xiao Yi cannot follow us anymore.
I am always ahead of you!
Be careful, do not wet your shoes.
Wow, how beautiful it is over here.
Hey, Qi Jin Xuan, it is snowing.
Be careful, Yao Zhe Tian, I am going to help you.
Hua Sheng, what are you doing?
I told you not to step on it.
Look closely, be careful what you step on.
You did not tell me you would bring friends.
It is a long way, is not it?
Come come, you do not need to be so polite.
Consider it as your own home.
Come look, I have never seen these things before.
They are on TV all the time.
Let me try, let me try.
Hua Sheng, do not break it.
I was wrong, do not follow me!
Jin Xuan, come pick up the food.
You are hungry now, are not you?
Do not be so polite, eat.
Qi Jin Xuan, I did not know that you knew how to cook.
There are many things that you still do not know.
Why does your mother live all the way here?
My father abandoned the both of us.
Then when I grew up a little,
he came back for the divorce process
and he took me into custody.
Saying it was for my sake.
But I wanted to continue to be with my mother.
I feel it is good to live in the countryside.
They are things from my past.
My mother told me that when I was a kid, I always wanted to be a pilot.
Do you still think about being a pilot?
Now I just want to become independent
that pilots go to a secondary schools every year to do a special training.
You just have to pass the physical.
Hey, look at this Qi Jin Xuan, he looks like a fool, look!
Remember to eat breakfast before going to school.
Miss, it is not necessary to accompany us.
It is the first time Jin Xuen brings some friends home.
This boy, ever since he was a kid, is so sensible.
But being that sensible makes me worry more.
It means that I was not that good at raising him.
I hope it will not matter where he is going.
He can have friends like you accompanying him.
Do not worry, we will accompany him forever.
We thought that if we said forever,
then it will be like that.
As if when we say'see you',
we would see each other again.
Why did you put it in?
What will happen if she sees it?
Do not be so direct with everything, ok?
Then pray that she accepts you.
Do not you have a more normal way?
You just kill and do not clean up?
A team of education inspectors are about to arrive.
and put your best behavior to greet the inspectors
Yao Zhe Tian's mother came to look for old Chen.
We already obtained the paper to add points.
Lately Yao Zhe Tian's notes are not stable.
I wish to cancel all extracurricular activities.
But the city's art performance, Yao Zhe Tian cannot miss that.
Master Chen, it is good to see you.
Oh, she is Yao Zhe Tian's mother from our course.
Oh yeah, Qi Jin Xuan is in your course.
That is to say that I am also the father of one of your student, Master Chen.
This blackboard report is not bad.
The information is new and very specific.
That blackboard report was made by Yao Zhe Tian.
She puts a lot of effort into the study and course work.
Our Jin Xuan is also excellent.
During the semester, Jin Xuan also changed a lot.
It is because you know how to teach, old Chen.
Your students really have talents of all kinds.
He can play basketball and Yang Ge.
How about we go to the meeting room and continue the talk over there?
The blackboard reports have yet to take the first place.
From now on, I can do the blackboard reports by myself.
I have not seen you put much heart in your studies.
So why are you paying so much attention to the blackboard reports?
Look at what you are drawing every day.
Hey, I think he drew Yao Zhe Tian.
I had you make the blackboard reports
but you were doing these things instead, huh?
You are not putting any effort into the exams!
Are not you going to put any?
That drawing, it was me who asked him to draw it.
I never really paid attention to the exams.
I like looking at these things.
It does not matter who wants it.
The exams are almost there, you know?
do not worry about the blackboard reports.
Huang Bo, Li Bao Qiang, Zhang Shu Qi.
We are going to the arcade.
Well, you want something to happen, right?
I will walk with you because tomorrow I am leaving.
I decided to become a pilot.
Tomorrow I will go and register.
Before I leave, come with me to the arcade.
Qi Jin Xuan, you are really good.
Want to give it a try?
I will teach you how to play.
You said you would let us play!
What do you mean by this?
When did I say I was leaving?
It is Hua Sheng, why is he here?
So you had someone watching your back?
Hey, Hua Sheng, I will solve my own thing by myself.
The one in the back is someone important.
His father... is the di... di... director of the education ministry.
What do we care about the education minister?
Qiang Ge, your nose is bleeding.
We will meet with them later.
My feet are going to split.
I will carry the bike in my hand.
Let us go find the other two.
Where did the two of them go?
We must go and look for them.
You know I should not talk about that.
I will not go back to school.
Then we will not see each other anymore,
Cannot you watch where you are going?
If you do not want to go to the university,
then I will not go either.
There is no difference between myself
and the bullies we just met.
Tu Xiao Yi, Tu Xiao Yi.
Tu Xiao Yi, Tu Xiao Yi!
I am giving you the opportunity.
The rest is up to you.
That drawing, it was me who asked him to draw it.
Then pray that she accepts you.
It was the first time I felt my heart beat madly.
I did not have enough courage
After that, Qi Jin Xuan did not show up at school anymore.
I decided to quit the exam.
Do you plan to enter an art university?
It is good that you have something that...
For best performance, the third-year blackboard reports will be paused for the next semester.
Master Chen, I decided to quit the exam, I will go draw instead.
No matter what you choose, I want you to be able to move forward.
I know that in Master Chen's heart,
the final exam was the most important stop for the future.
But it is not a stop for the train of life.
We are all going in our own direction, driving to a different place.
Thank you Xue Zhang, I am the President of 2nd Year class 4,
can I ask you to copy the contents of your blackboard reports for our course?
You strove hard for those blackboard reports.
I wish you luck and that you can stay first forever in any job.
But no slap in the back, try your best, strive!
Every week I have to go up to the 3rd floor just to see your blackboard reports.
Your blackboard reports are too good, Xue Zhang's notes are probably great!
Surely you can enter your first choice university, try your best!
It will be the time for me to leave for Shen Zhen.
Wow, that is a great city.
When you earn good money, do not forget about me.
Now in my life, I can see the goal with my own eyes.
You are still doing something that you like.
I only know how to do this.
Oh, right, did you really quit?
I am drawing my own manga.
Yes, I am rooting for you.
Take advantage that you can still choose.
Go do what you really want to do.
On Wednesday at 4pm at the city hall there will be a demonstration of art and culture.
Except for those in third year, all other classes must arrive on time to participate.
What are you carrying your backpack for?
It is only because I came
And I plan to continue drawing.
That is why I decided to go to Shen Zhen.
It is a small manga company.
Maybe for me it will be a new beginning.
Wait, you are not going to participate in the final exams?
When I decided not to go to the final exam, in my heart I felt a little...
It is good that this magazine...
I just took them out today.
Did you get them out of the mailbox?
I sneaked them out and I still have not read any of them.
It is the first time I sneak them out behind my mother's back.
They got so wet, even if I return them, she will notice.
It seems that there is a letter.
Do you know what it is?
I do not know what it is.
It is all blurred, you cannot see anything.
It was a gift from the magazine.
I think it is not good anymore.
I always want to do something right.
But it is not always what I end up doing.
If only this morning I had not taken out the magazines.
There would not have been a need to return them in time.
that If you have something that you really like
Although even if in the end you cannot be together,
You will probably like that person.
You will shine for liking him.
You found what you really like.
I wish everyone to shine in their own way.
Yes, Hua Sheng, do not cry.
When I get there, I will call you.
You do not need to go further, right here it is good.
Do not forget us when you get to the big city!
Help me give this to Tu Xiao Yi.
that the magazine that Qi Jin Xuan gave me
opened the way to go make mangas at Shen Zhen.
If that summer would have been a little longer
maybe I would have said see you
If at that moment I had said I will see you
would it have been possible to find each other again?
Wow, you are missing a lot, Tu Xiao Yi, you will not be able to win.
No, I have not lost yet.
It will be the end of the day if you continue trying.
Well, I will help you this time, but
when you become mangaka, you have to draw a story about us.
It is LAN Xi, it is really good looking!
It was drawn just now by a guy.
I told him that he drew well and he gave it to me.
Nothing, I just remembered something from before.
Come on, Mom will take you to eat some crystal cake.
Do not run so much, be careful or you will fall.
Mom, I want to learn how to draw.
Well, if you have something that you like to do, go for it.
If at that moment he would have told us see you later Would we have been able to see each other again?
